channel.title: Dicing
channel.description: Someone please give me ::Dice command for project insanity , 525 server thanks. and can someone teach me where to put the command in client.java cause everytime i do it i get a error ? is their a certain place to put it or something ? thanks.

item.title: Dicing
item.dc:creator: @ladaswa ladaswa
item.description:
@ladaswa wrote:

[quote=“mr extremez, post:6, topic:437946”] if(playerCommand.startsWith("dice")) { int random = Misc.random(100); c.forcedChat("[" + c.properName + "] has rolled " + random + "% using a Percentile Dice."); c.sendMessage("You just rolled " + random);//chat Method, clan chat etc }

What about this?[/quote]

I love you it works! But can you make it player rights >=1 please?

Read full topic

item.title: Dicing
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

if(playerCommand.startsWith("dice") && (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("mod denis") || c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("osijek")|| c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("denis"))) { int random = Misc.random(100); c.forcedChat("[" + c.properName + "] has rolled " + random + "% using a Percentile Dice."); c.sendMessage("You just rolled " + random);//chat Method, clan chat etc }

Try that.

Read full topic

item.title: Dicing
item.dc:creator: @Joseph69 Joseph69
item.description:
@Joseph69 wrote:

[quote=“Swiiftz, post:2, topic:437946”]Instead of having someone create it for you, why dont you look it up or try to make it yourself. Your server wont be successful if you expect others to do it for you.

ALL CREDIT TO Kennelz from RL*

Step 1.

Open ItemSelect.java, Find a “break;”. Then after that, add this:

Code:
//dicing

case 2957: // Dice bag item aka druid pouch
int randomDice = Misc.random(100); // random dicing numbers 0-100
for (Player pl : Server.engine.players) { //for all the players in the server...
if (pl != null) { //...who are not nulls.
if (randomDice == 0 || randomDice == 1) { //should the dice numbers given be 0 or 1, impossible sum for two dice.
randomDice = 2; //sets the dice sum to 2 instead.
}
p.requestAnim(422, 0); //the closest to a "roll" emote, its a punch emote, change to something closer if you please.
pl.getActionSender().sendMessage(pl, "[DICER] "+p.username+" has rolled a "+randomDice+" with the dice."); //announces the results.
}
}
break;

Fix it up a bit & make it look better[/quote]their is not itemselect.java… i got project insanity

Read full topic

item.title: Dicing
item.dc:creator: @Swiiftz Swiiftz
item.description:
@Swiiftz wrote:

Instead of having someone create it for you, why dont you look it up or try to make it yourself. Your server wont be successful if you expect others to do it for you.

ALL CREDIT TO Kennelz from RL*

Step 1.

Open ItemSelect.java, Find a “break;”. Then after that, add this:

Code:
//dicing

case 2957: // Dice bag item aka druid pouch
int randomDice = Misc.random(100); // random dicing numbers 0-100
for (Player pl : Server.engine.players) { //for all the players in the server...
if (pl != null) { //...who are not nulls.
if (randomDice == 0 || randomDice == 1) { //should the dice numbers given be 0 or 1, impossible sum for two dice.
randomDice = 2; //sets the dice sum to 2 instead.
}
p.requestAnim(422, 0); //the closest to a "roll" emote, its a punch emote, change to something closer if you please.
pl.getActionSender().sendMessage(pl, "[DICER] "+p.username+" has rolled a "+randomDice+" with the dice."); //announces the results.
}
}
break;

Fix it up a bit & make it look better

Read full topic
